{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/87","id":2891904621,"node_id":"PR_kwDOOcuOYs6sXvZt","html_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/87","diff_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/87.diff","patch_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/87.patch","issue_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/issues/87","number":87,"state":"closed","locked":false,"title":"feat: make each widget's feed URL editable","user":{"login":"sheepdestroyer","id":1377479,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjEzNzc0Nzk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/1377479?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer","html_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/received_events","type":"User","user_view_type":"public","site_admin":false},"body":"## Description\nThis PR implements the ability to edit feed URLs for each widget in the SheepVibes application.\n\n## Changes Made\n- **Backend**: Added PUT endpoint `/api/feeds/<feed_id>` for updating feed URLs with validation\n- **Frontend**: \n  - Added edit button (✎) to each feed widget\n  - Created modal dialog for editing feed URLs with form validation\n  - Implemented JavaScript functionality for the edit workflow\n  - Added CSS styling for edit button and modal\n- **Infrastructure**:\n  - Configured CORS for frontend-backend communication\n  - Fixed backend import issues and function naming conflicts\n  - Ensured consistent relative imports throughout the backend\n- **Testing**: All backend tests passing (74/74, 1 skipped)\n- **Documentation**: Updated TODO.md and CHANGELOG.md\n\n## Features\n- Users can now click the edit button (✎) on any feed widget\n- Modal dialog opens with current feed URL and name\n- Form validation ensures valid URLs before submission\n  - Feed content is automatically refreshed after URL update\n- Error handling for invalid URLs or network issues\n\n## Testing\nThe functionality has been thoroughly tested:\n- Backend API endpoints respond correctly\n- Frontend UI works seamlessly with backend\n- Edit workflow successfully updates feed URLs\n- CORS configuration allows frontend-backend communication\n\n## Code Review Feedback Addressed\n- Fixed inconsistent imports by reverting to relative imports throughout the backend\n- Resolved performance issues by limiting feed items in PUT responses\n\n## Related Issues\nImplements the feature requested to make feed URLs editable.","created_at":"2025-10-06T21:10:53Z","updated_at":"2025-10-06T21:19:23Z","closed_at":"2025-10-06T21:19:23Z","merged_at":null,"merge_commit_sha":"db29c8d5ec96ff80c7b52e35a0b92ff1885579bf","assignee":null,"assignees":[],"requested_reviewers":[],"requested_teams":[],"labels":[],"milestone":null,"draft":false,"commits_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/87/commits","review_comments_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/87/comments","review_comment_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/comments{/number}","comments_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/issues/87/comments","statuses_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/statuses/c59180ab984f1f3e943e41588f4d34362e2c789c","head":{"label":"sheepdestroyer:feat/editable-feed-urls","ref":"feat/editable-feed-urls","sha":"c59180ab984f1f3e943e41588f4d34362e2c789c","user":{"login":"sheepdestroyer","id":1377479,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjEzNzc0Nzk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/1377479?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer","html_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https:/
